pageDescription: Julio Sepia's resume - Frontend development, UX prototyping and UI design
title: Julio Sepia
subtitle: Sr. Design technologist
bio: I'm Julio, a frontend developer with professional experience in graphic design, UI design, web application development, and game programming. If the job requires it, I'll learn it. As a design technologist, I work closely with stakeholders to design, research, and prototype effective user experiences.
